title: ZX Stairway Rush [1.1.4] (Original ZX Spectrum Game)
description:
Remember being glued to the TV screen playing awesome games?
Relive those days now with your mobile!

ZX Stairway Rush, is inspired in the great ZX Spectum classic games.

The controls are very simple:

Simply tap to stop! 

But watch out, because whenever you stop, the giant blades come closer!

Danger is everywhere, so you must also dodge the falling hazards. 

ZX Stairway rush - Spectrum Nostalgia, is a game of action and strategy,
and is sure to challenge your skills.

But not everything is out to get you in this game. Keep an eye open for the 
bonus points and try to beat your score in each new run!



Install apk
ENJOY!
